item.title: Getting started... My first Hackathon !
item.description: Prejudmania is a game that I had worked on at the 2020 GSU Hackathon that my school had hosted. I was inspired not only by my personal experience but the short amount of time I had to complete it. This being my first Hackathon, I wasn’t really sure what to expect. Though I was nervous at first, soon after the event, I wondered why I was even nervous at all !
